headings.title: ## Folder Structure
headings.description:
- `calculator.js`: Contains the JavaScript code for the calculator functionality.
- `result.txt`: A file to store the results of calculations.

headings.title: ## Dependencies
headings.description:
The project requires the following dependencies:
- Javascript 
- Text

headings.title: ## Overview
headings.description:
The project consists of the following components:
1. `calculator.js`: This Javascript file contains the code for the calculator, handling user input, performing calculations, and displaying results.
2. `result.txt`: This text file stores the results of calculations performed using the calculator.

headings.title: # Title
headings.description: This project is a simple calculator implemented in JavaScript. It allows users to perform basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The calculator is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The `calculator.js` file contains the JavaScript code for handling user input, performing calculations, and displaying results. The `result.txt` file is used to store the results of calculations.

headings.title: ## Code Structure
headings.description:
The key components of the code include:
- **calculator.js:** This file contains the JavaScript code that implements the calculator functionality. It includes functions for handling user input, performing calculations, and displaying the results.
- **result.txt:** This file is used to store the results of the calculations performed by the calculator.

headings.title: ## Usage
headings.description:
1. Open the `calculator.js` file in a text editor.
2. Run the `calculator.js` file in a browser.
3. Use the buttons on the calculator to perform calculations.
4. The results of the calculations will be displayed in the `result.txt` file.
